trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of mapped folders in a SharePoint project.
trans-unit.target: 表示 SharePoint 项目中的映射文件夹的集合。

trans-unit.source: Mapped folders are folders in a SharePoint project that correspond to the physical location of certain files in the SharePoint Server installation.
trans-unit.target: 映射的文件夹是 SharePoint 项目中的 SharePoint Server 安装的某些文件的物理位置相对应的文件夹。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add and Remove Mapped Folders](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-add-and-remove-mapped-folders.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 添加和移除映射文件夹](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-add-and-remove-mapped-folders.md)。

trans-unit.source: The type of mapped folder to create.
trans-unit.target: 要创建的映射文件夹的类型。

trans-unit.source: Adds a mapped folder with the specified type to the current SharePoint project, and also adds the mapped folder to the package in the project.
trans-unit.target: 将指定类型的映射文件夹添加到当前的 SharePoint 项目中，并将映射文件夹也添加到项目的包中。

trans-unit.source: The mapped folder that was created.
trans-unit.target: 已创建的映射文件夹。

trans-unit.source: When you use this method, you can specify any <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.MappedFolderType> value except for <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.MappedFolderType.Other>.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用此方法时，你可以指定任何<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.MappedFolderType>值除外<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.MappedFolderType.Other>。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="folderType" /> parameter is <see cref="F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.MappedFolderType.Other" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="folderType" /> 参数为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.MappedFolderType.Other" />。

trans-unit.source: The path in SharePoint to which the mapped folder is mapped.
trans-unit.target: SharePoint 中映射文件夹映射到的路径。

trans-unit.source: This path is relative to the root of the SharePoint hive.
trans-unit.target: 此路径相对于 SharePoint 配置单元的根目录。

trans-unit.source: If the folder does not currently exist, it will be created when the solution is deployed.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件夹当前不存在，则它将在部署解决方案时创建。

trans-unit.source: Adds a mapped folder with the specified deployment path to the current SharePoint project, and also adds the mapped folder to the package in the project.
trans-unit.target: 将具有指定部署路径的映射文件夹添加到当前的 SharePoint 项目中，并将映射文件夹也添加到项目的包中。

trans-unit.source: The mapped folder that was created.
trans-unit.target: 已创建的映射文件夹。

trans-unit.source: When you use this method to create a mapped folder and you specify a `deploymentPath` value that does not correspond to one of the standard mapped folder locations, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IMappedFolder.FolderType%2A> property of the mapped folder has the value <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.MappedFolderType.Other>.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用此方法创建一个映射的文件夹和您指定`deploymentPath`不对应的标准映射的文件夹位置，请之一的值<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IMappedFolder.FolderType%2A>映射的文件夹的属性具有值<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.MappedFolderType.Other>。

trans-unit.source: The type of mapped folder to create.
trans-unit.target: 要创建的映射文件夹的类型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to automatically add the mapped folder to the package in the project; otherwise, <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果映射文件夹自动添加到项目的包中，则为 <see langword="false" />；否则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a mapped folder with the specified type to the current SharePoint project.
trans-unit.target: 将指定类型的映射文件夹添加到当前的 SharePoint 项目中。

trans-unit.source: The mapped folder that was created.
trans-unit.target: 已创建的映射文件夹。

trans-unit.source: When you use this method, you can specify any <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.MappedFolderType> value except for <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.MappedFolderType.Other>.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用此方法时，你可以指定任何<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.MappedFolderType>值除外<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.MappedFolderType.Other>。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="folderType" /> parameter is <see cref="F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.MappedFolderType.Other" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="folderType" /> 参数为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.MappedFolderType.Other" />。

trans-unit.source: The path in SharePoint to which the mapped folder is mapped.
trans-unit.target: SharePoint 中映射文件夹映射到的路径。

trans-unit.source: This path is relative to the root of the SharePoint hive.
trans-unit.target: 此路径相对于 SharePoint 配置单元的根目录。

trans-unit.source: If the folder does not currently exist, it will be created when the solution is deployed.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件夹当前不存在，则它将在部署解决方案时创建。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to automatically add the mapped folder to the package in the project; otherwise, <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果映射文件夹自动添加到项目的包中，则为 <see langword="false" />；否则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a mapped folder with the specified deployment path to the current SharePoint project.
trans-unit.target: 将具有指定部署路径的映射文件夹添加到当前的 SharePoint 项目中。

trans-unit.source: The mapped folder that was created.
trans-unit.target: 已创建的映射文件夹。

trans-unit.source: When you use this method to create a mapped folder and you specify a `deploymentPath` value that does not correspond to one of the standard mapped folder locations, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IMappedFolder.FolderType%2A> property of the mapped folder has the value <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.MappedFolderType.Other>.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用此方法创建一个映射的文件夹和您指定`deploymentPath`不对应的标准映射的文件夹位置，请之一的值<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IMappedFolder.FolderType%2A>映射的文件夹的属性具有值<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.MappedFolderType.Other>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the SharePoint project that is associated with this mapped folder collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此映射文件夹集合相关联的 SharePoint 项目。

trans-unit.source: The SharePoint project that is associated with this mapped folder collection.
trans-unit.target: 与此关联的 SharePoint 项目映射文件夹集合。
